Key Match Events: Kansas City Royals lost 4-2 to the Cleveland Guardians on September 2, 2024.
Maikel Garcia recorded the only hit off Guardians starter Gavin Williams in seven innings, a double that scored Yuli Gurriel.
Gurriel’s double in the eighth was the second and final hit for the Royals.
Michael Wacha gave up a two-run homer to Lane Thomas in the fifth inning.
Josh Naylor hit a two-run homer in the sixth inning off reliever Kris Bubic.
Post-Match Reflections: Michael Massey commented on the team's offensive struggles and emphasized the importance of situational hitting.
General manager J.J. Picollo stressed the need for the team to focus on small details and not to overcompensate for Vinnie Pasquantino’s injury.
Michael Wacha mentioned the need to pay attention to small details and continue competing.
